gtmId.title: Google Tag Manager ID for main binding or parts.whirlpool.xx
gtmId.description: Enter the ID (GTM-XXXX) from your Google Tag Manager for the main parts.whirlpool.xx binding

gtmIdBK.description: Enter the ID (GTM-XXXX) from your Google Tag Manager for the parts.bauknecht.xx binding

gtmIdIN.title: Google Tag Manager ID for parts.indesit.xx binding
gtmIdIN.description: Enter the ID (GTM-XXXX) from your Google Tag Manager for the parts.indesit.xx binding

allowCustomHtmlTags.title: Allow Custom HTML tags
allowCustomHtmlTags.description: Beware that using Custom HTML tags can drastically impact the store's performance

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: DO NOT INSERT unsless you know what you're doing!

data_coookieconsent.title: Enable cookie consent mode
data_coookieconsent.description: Must be false in case of google consent mode script inserted

ad_storage.title: ad_storage param
ad_storage.description: Analytics team must provided the value

analytics_storage.title: analytics_storage param
analytics_storage.description: Analytics team must provided the value, The analytics_storage value must be granted only for the Italian site

functionality_storage.title: functionality_storage param
functionality_storage.description: Analytics team must provided the value

personalization_storage.title: personalization_storage param
personalization_storage.description: Analytics team must provided the value

security_storage.title: security_storage param
security_storage.description: Analytics team must provided the value

wait_for_update.title: Wait time for update
wait_for_update.description: wait_for_update along with a millisecond value to control how long to wait before data is sent

cdnId.title: CDN ID
cdnId.description: Enter the ID cdn ID from your One Trust consolle

s.title: Service
s.description: Enter the service URL for One Trust

url.title: Url
url.description: Enter the URL for One Trust

domain.title: Data Domain O2P/EPP/parts.whirlpool.xx
domain.description: Data Domain for O2P or EPP binding

one_trust_custom.title: One Trust custom script
one_trust_custom.description: If true add custom script for the accept button

one_trust_uk.title: One Trust custom script for UK countries
one_trust_uk.description: One Trust custom script for UK countries and if true add custom script for the accept button

default.regex: &searchState|{Insert the name of the product category (ex. appliances)}
